friendlyDescription: 2. Doppler-velocity sonar log equipment having speed "accuracy" better than 1% of speed.
legalDescription: 2. Doppler-velocity sonar log equipment having speed "accuracy" better than 1% of speed.
beforeLegalDefinitionText: Note 1: 6A001.b. does not control depth sounders limited to any of the following: a. Measuring the depth of water; b. Measuring the distance of submerged or buried objects; or c. Fish finding. Note 2: 6A001.b. does not control equipment specially designed for installation on surface vessels.
